paragraph.text: Try checking your spelling or searching something less specific.

horizontalTilesATL.title: Bananas, Bunch
horizontalTilesATL.description:
*Average bunch has 6-8 bananas.
Bananas are typically 6-10 inches long and have a green peel when unripe. They taste best when the peel turns yellow and is speckled with dark spots.

horizontalTilesATL.title: Organic Bananas, Bunch
horizontalTilesATL.description: *Average bunch has 6-8 bananas. Bananas are typically 6-10 inches long and have a green peel when unripe. They taste best when the peel turns yellow and is speckled with dark spots. Add bananas to your morning cereal or oatmeal, mash for breads, muffins, and cakes, or slice to make a classic banana cream pie.

horizontalTilesATL.title: Drinkable Yogurt, Banana 1.5%
horizontalTilesATL.description: nanö Drinkable Yogurt is made especially for kids with 40% less sugar and is also  made with real fruit, no preservatives, no gelatin, artificial flavours, artificial colours and made in Canada!

horizontalTilesATL.title: Bear Paws Banana Bread
horizontalTilesATL.description:
• Kids love Bear Paws Banana Bread cookies, and parents do too!
  • each soft cookie is made better with real bananas and no artificial colours, flavours or sweeteners.
  • You can pack them in the lunch box for an easy snack, enjoy them at home or on the go.
  • Bear Paws Banana Bread cookies are peanut-free.
  • 0g Trans Fat, Low in saturated fat, Low Cholesteral, Portion Controlled, Source of Iron
  • Made by Dare, a Proudly Canadian Company

horizontalTilesATL.description: Oikos Greek Yogurt - High in protein : The dream snack for your cravings

productImage.altText: PC Organics Banana, Sweet Potato & Blueberry Strained Baby Food

horizontalTilesATL.title: Banana, Sweet Potato & Blueberry Strained Baby Food
horizontalTilesATL.description: Quick! You only have 5 minutes to throw everything in the diaper bag before heading out for a playdate. Luckily, you’ve got a stash of our organic baby food pouches that you can toss in without any fear of mess or breakage. Excellent for babies 6 months and up, our tasty purées - like this one made with organic banana, sweet potato and blueberry - have no added sugar. Just squeeze the food straight onto a spoon – or let your self-feeding baby eat directly from the pouch.

productImage.altText: PC Organics Mini Cereal Bars, Banana Berry

horizontalTilesATL.title: Mini Cereal Bars, Banana Berry
horizontalTilesATL.description: This product is suitable for children 12 months and older. This product should only be fed to seated and supervised children who are accustomed to chewing solid food. • Source of iron • Made with whole grain whole wheat flour, whole grain rolled oats and enriched wheat flour • Made with banana purée, raspberry and strawberry juice concentrates • No artificial flavours or artificial colours

horizontalTilesATL.title: Minigo Duo Fresh Cheese Strawberry-Banana/Blueberry-Strawberry/Banana-Blueberry
horizontalTilesATL.description:
Help your kids grow strong by giving them Yoplait Minigo every day. Parents love the goodness, kids love the great taste! Perfect serving size for little ones!
  • No artificial colours or flavours
  • With probiotics
  • Source of vitamin D and calcium to help build strong bones

horizontalTilesATL.title: Loaf Cake, Banana
horizontalTilesATL.description: Loaf cakes are versatile cakes that are baked in loaf pans. They can be sweet or savoury and served with breakfast or as an afternoon snack. Banana loaf cake combines sweet batter with ripe bananas.

horizontalTilesATL.title: Plantains, Single
horizontalTilesATL.description: Plantains are larger than regular bananas, with thicker skin and less sugar. They are typically cooked when green and have a mild flavour that is similar to squash. Bake sliced plantains for chips, or mash and season with lime and salt for a flavourful side dish.

horizontalTilesATL.title: Minigo Fresh Cheese Strawberry/Strawberry-Vanilla/Strawberry-Banana
horizontalTilesATL.description:
Help your kids grow strong by giving them Yoplait Minigo every day. Parents love the goodness, kids love the great taste! Perfect serving size for little ones!
  • No artificial colours or flavours
  • With probiotics
  • Source of vitamin D and calcium to help build strong bones

horizontalTilesATL.title: Banana, Apple & Carrot
horizontalTilesATL.description: Wait till you see how our squeezable BPA-free pouches give you added convenience and portability. What a great alternative to jars! You can squeeze food directly onto spoons or into bowls. And when baby is ready, they’re ideal for self-feeding. Made with certified organic ingredients with no sugar added and no artificial flavours or colours. Try adding a couple spoonfuls to baby cereal for added taste.

horizontalTilesATL.title: Apple, Banana & Blueberry
horizontalTilesATL.description: Suitable for babies 9 months and older, our strained organic baby food can be squeezed directly from pouch to spoon for easy feeding and cleanup. Made with creamy yogurt and a delicious blend of organic apple, banana and blueberry purées, it has no sugar added.

productImage.altText: Made Good Soft Baked Mini Cookies Chocolate Banana

horizontalTilesATL.title: Soft Baked Mini Cookies Chocolate Banana
Banana & Kiwi
horizontalTilesATL.description: No sugar added. No artificial flavours or artificial colours.

productImage.altText: President's Choice Pickled Hot Banana Pepper Rings

horizontalTilesATL.title: Pickled Hot Banana Pepper Rings
horizontalTilesATL.description: The fastest, easiest way to add a hit of spicy flavour to sandwiches, salads and burgers. We love them in sauces and stirfries, too.

productImage.altText: GoGo squeez Squeeze, Applesauce Apple Banana

horizontalTilesATL.title: Squeeze, Applesauce Apple Banana
horizontalTilesATL.description:
Gogo Squeez is a pasteurized product that allows shelf storage at room temperature without using preservatives.

Made with nothing but... real fruit & a splash of juice!.

Ideal for lunch box.

productImage.altText: Leclerc Go Pure Fruit and Oat Bars, Banana and Strawberry

horizontalTilesATL.title: Go Pure Fruit and Oat Bars, Banana and Strawberry

productImage.altText: President's Choice Strawberries, Bananas & Kiwi Fruit Blend

horizontalTilesATL.title: Strawberries, Bananas & Kiwi Fruit Blend
horizontalTilesATL.description: Tropical fruit is in season all year round thanks to this ripe, juicy frozen blend. Unlike fresh fruit there’s no prep required, so you can instantly add some to smoothies and milkshakes or top your cereal, yogurt and ice cream. For a tasty treat, blend fruit with yogurt or kefir and freeze on sticks for homemade freezer pops.

productImage.altText: Gerber Organic Yogurt Melts, Strawberry Banana

horizontalTilesATL.title: Organic Yogurt Melts, Strawberry Banana
horizontalTilesATL.description:
Introducing new GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS Strawberry Banana (28 g) made for your little toddler. GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS are a delicious, no-mess toddler snack made with the goodness of real organic yogurt and fruit. GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS dissolve easily, are easy to chew and swallow, and are perfectly shaped and sized for little hands. They’re a source of calcium, and contain no artificial flavours, colours or sweeteners.
  • Perfect Toddler Yogurt Snack — GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS are designed to be nutritious and delicious, made with real organic yogurt and fruit, with NO artificial flavours, colours or sweeteners
  • GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS contain NO added salt and are non-GMO**Not made with genetically engineered ingredients, like all organic products.
  • GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS are a source of calcium, which helps build strong bones and teeth
  • GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS dissolve easily, are easy to chew and swallow
  • Our GERBER Organic YOGURT MELTS are perfectly shaped and sized for little hands – helping toddlers to learn how to self-feed

productImage.altText: Bicks Pickled Hot Banana Pepper Rings

horizontalTilesATL.title: Pickled Hot Banana Pepper Rings
horizontalTilesATL.description: Bickâ€™s Hot Pepper Rings are a blend of red yellow and orange banana peppers sliced to make topping your favourite meals easy. Flavoured in an extra spicy brine for that kick of heat you crave add it to BBQ fare or sandwiches to spice up your everyday meals.

horizontalTilesATL.title: PUFFS, Banana, Baby Snacks
horizontalTilesATL.description:
New look, same great taste! GERBER PUFFS, Banana, Baby Snacks (42 g) are made with your little one in mind. GERBER PUFFS are made with whole grains, rice, and real apple. They dissolve easily, and are a great source of iron and zinc, which help support baby’s normal growth and development. Even more, GERBER PUFFS are perfectly shaped and sized for picking up! Our star-shaped Puffs are a great first finger food snack for baby, and also help develop your baby’s fine oral and motor skills.
  • Perfect for baby’s first finger food snack — GERBER PUFFS dissolve easily (they are melt-in-your-mouth good) and are nutritious, with no artificial colours or flavours
  • GERBER PUFFS contain 3 g of whole grains per serving and contain no added salt*
  • GERBER PUFFS are made with only NON-GMO ingredients**
  • GERBER PUFFS are an excellent source of zinc and iron, which help support baby’s growth and development
  • GERBER PUFFS are Kosher
*All cereal-based foods for babies under 12 months should not contain added salt.**Not made with genetically engineered ingredients

productImage.altText: President's Choice Banana Split Mini Ice Cream Bars

horizontalTilesATL.title: Banana Split Mini Ice Cream Bars
horizontalTilesATL.description: Banana and vanilla-flavoured ice creams studded with chopped cherries, in a rich milk chocolatey coating with peanut pieces - on a stick!

productImage.altText: Betty Crocker Banana Bread with Walnuts Mix

horizontalTilesATL.title: Banana Bread with Walnuts Mix
horizontalTilesATL.description: A delicious dessert is only a few minutes way with Betty Crocker Banana Bread mix! Serve as banana bread or make your own muffins for a great tasting snack!

horizontalTilesATL.title: Cherry Banana & Spinach
horizontalTilesATL.description: Bursting with bright ripe cherries, creamy banana and fresh green spinach, this simple blend will excite little one's on their food journey.

horizontalTilesATL.title: Lolly Banana
horizontalTilesATL.description: It’s almost as if you peeled the banana itself. Chapman’s banana lollys are packed with Natural flavour. They are Peanut/Nut Free, Gluten Free and Lactose Free. At 40 calories per treat you are free to have as many as you wish…we’ll never tell.

productImage.altText: Made Good Granola Minis, Chocolate Banana
